formatDescription: The Chemical Draw Exchange Format is the native format of ChemDraw software, a molecule editor developed by  CambridgeSoft for use on Macintosh and Windows platforms. The format is used to store accurate chemical drawings and molecular data in a tagged binary format.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Chemical Draw Exchange format
internalSignatures.note: Header: ASCII value "VjCD0100", followed by 4 reserved bytes (04 03 02 01) and 10 reserved bytes set to zero.

developedBy.source: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
